scripts.build: pnpm -C apps/api build && pnpm -C apps/web build
scripts.security:scan: bash -lc 'if rg -n "(ghp_[A-Za-z0-9]{20,}|sk_live_[A-Za-z0-9]+|-----BEGIN [A-Z ]*PRIVATE KEY-----|AKIA[0-9A-Z]{16})" -S . --glob "!**/.git/**" --glob "!**/node_modules/**"; then echo SECRET_PATTERN_DETECTED; exit 1; else echo SECURITY_SCAN_OK; fi' && node tools/security/validate-sensitive-policies.js
